name: Mental Health Care for Veterans
description: San Francisco VA Medical Center offers mental health care to Veterans with issues like addiction, substance abuse, PTSD, or trauma. Services provided include: - Individual counseling and group therapy - Medication and treatment - 24-hour therapeutic and educational programs How to Apply: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by calling 415-221-4810, ext. 2-4824. - If you need help right away, walk-i

howToGetIt: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by calling 415-221-4810, ext. 2-4824. - If you need help right away, walk-in to the Clinic during open hours. - For mental health crises: Call the Veteransâ€™ Crisis Line at 800-273-8255 (Press 1)
agency: San Francisco VA Medical Center - Fort Miley
